title: Strengthening Pre-Service Teacher Competencies via Prototype-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers to learn creative lesson design and assessment methods applicable in real classrooms

learning_goals: Pre-service teachers can develop three or more social studies learning activities by applying prototype design principles.
Learners can analyze the educational effectiveness of prototype-based activities with over 80% accuracy through peer evaluation.
Participants can perform prototype improvement feedback five or more times using LMS-based collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
